titleStmt.title: The character of a compleat physician, or naturalist.
titleStmt.author: Merret, Christopher, 1614-1695.
Mee, Dr.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Mee, M.D. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Place of publication and printer from colophon; date of publication from Wing.
Identified as Wing M1613 on UMI Early English Books microfilm reel 428.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
